name: DEPTH (itch) (Revolver Softworks)
description:
Sent below to restore power, you find yourself in the company of something else lurking with you..
Made in 2 months for a College Project.
------------------------------------------------------------------------

This will continue to be updated with bug fixes and new features, and possibly VR support.

----

Update 1.1:

  • added sounds to the breakers when they are pulled
  • fixed AI sight not correctly detecting the player
  • revamped the level layout
  • added  screen resolutions to set the game to (both fullscreen and windowed variants)
  • added more visibility for the player
  • made the monster a little more quieter

----

This game is not easy.

Major thanks to all internal beta testers who helped get this project so far!
